clickActiveConnector: Can't select or delete a connector with active connections
guide-changeLanguage: You can change the language to persian
guide-data: Download and save your information or send it to others
guide-focusMode: Focus on the lesson when choosing
guide-editMode: You can delete lessons that have no connection with other lessons or move the position of lessons
guide-markMode: You can choose lessons without restrictions
guide-createMode: Create your own chart and you can also share it with your friends
guide-optimization: You can control the number of lessons displayed to improve performance
guide-printReport: Report of lessons taken and the number of units
guide-chromeExtension: convert lessons names to the standard Azad University format.
